scripts.migration:run: npm run dev:load-envs prisma migrate deploy
scripts.migration:generate: npm run dev:load-envs prisma migrate dev
scripts.test:migration:run: npm run test:load-envs prisma migrate deploy
scripts.test:migration:generate: npm run test:load-envs prisma migrate dev
scripts.test:migrate: dotenv -e .env.test npx prisma migrate deploy && NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules dotenv -e .env.test jest -i
scripts.test:docker:migration:run: npm run test:compose -- run restaurant-menu-test npm run test:load-envs prisma migrate deploy
scripts.test:docker:migration:generate: npm run test:compose -- run restaurant-menu-test npm run test:load-envs prisma migrate dev
scripts.test:docker:seed: npm run test:compose -- run restaurant-menu-test npm run test:load-envs prisma db seed
scripts.dev:migration:run: npm run dev:compose -- run restaurant-menu-development npm run dev:load-envs prisma migrate deploy
scripts.dev:migration:generate: npm run dev:compose -- run restaurant-menu-development npm run dev:load-envs prisma migrate dev
scripts.dev:seed: npm run dev:compose -- run restaurant-menu-development npm run dev:load-envs prisma db seed
scripts.dev:prisma:studio: npm run dev:compose -- run restaurant-menu-development npm run dev:load-envs prisma studio
scripts.ci:test: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run restaurant-menu-test bash -c 'npm run test:migration:run && npm test'
